cloudwatch.title: Chatbot for AWS Monitoring
cloudwatch.description: Configure monitoring, receive alerts, solve incidents. Works with Slack and Microsoft Teams.

ec2.title: Amazon Web Services in Action
ec2.description: A comprehensive introduction to computing, storing, and networking in the AWS cloud. You'll find clear, relevant coverage of all the essential AWS services you to know, emphasizing best practices for security, high availability and scalability.

ecr.title: Rapid Docker on AWS
ecr.description: Rapid Docker on AWS is designed for DevOps engineers and web developers who want to run dockerized web applications on AWS. We lead you with many examples: From dockerizing your application to Continuous Deployment and Infrastructure as Code on AWS. No prior knowledge of Docker and AWS is required.
